text.style: font-size:26.6667px;font-family:'Maple Mono CN';-inkscape-font-specification:'Maple Mono CN';text-align:start;writing-mode:lr-tb;direction:ltr;text-anchor:start;fill:#858585;fill-opacity:0.212963;fill-rule:evenodd;stroke:#696969;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-opacity:1;paint-order:stroke markers fill

text.tspan: indicates the scope of a single verification. All methods report false if any one of them finds an error.
Partition into chunks of length k and verify
Iterate and subdivide up to n times
The minimum split length is k
